title: Add awaiting filter to tk view
description:
Add filter capability in the TUI (tk view) for awaiting status

Should support:
- Filter to show only awaiting tasks (human queue)
- Filter to show only non-awaiting tasks (agent queue)
- Filter by specific awaiting type (approval, review, etc.)

Possible UX:
- 'h' key to toggle 'human tasks only' filter
- 'H' key (shift) to cycle through awaiting types
- Status bar shows current filter

This complements the existing filters (owner, labels, search) to help humans manage their review queue.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Can filter to show only awaiting tasks
- [ ] Can filter to show only agent tasks
- [ ] Can filter by specific awaiting type
- [ ] Filter state shown in status bar
closed_reason: Added awaiting filter to TUI with 'h' key (cycles off->human->agent) and 'H' key (cycles specific awaiting types). Implemented applyAwaitingFilter(), updated buildItems() pipeline, added status bar indicators, and created unit tests. Files: internal/tui/model.go, internal/tui/model_test.go
